name: Patrick Waivers
summary: Software Engineer at Google with extensive experience in data management and software development, focusing on cloud data centers and market data solutions.
work_history:

project_history: At Credit Suisse, developed a deal management website using AngularJS, HTML5, MVC.NET, and SQL Server. Designed and developed a web service to facilitate communication with another system during an internship.
skills: Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Python, AngularJS, HTML5, MVC.NET, SQL Server
education: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, BS in Computer Science, Graduated 2013
